sidebar.dashboardDesc: Main detail info of your asset property.
sidebar.assetsDesc: Asset property that is rented to tenants.
sidebar.tenantsDesc: Tenants that rent your asset property.
sidebar.tenureContractsDesc: Tenure contract of the asset property and tenant.

dashboard.overdueIncomeDesc: Income (Rent & Other) that have already been due over the due date (incl. of Grace Period).
dashboard.upcomingIncomeDesc: Income (Rent & Other) that you are expected to receive in the set given time range.
dashboard.overdueExpensesDesc: Expenses that you are been due to. For eg. Maintaince fees that is overdue.
dashboard.upcomingExpensesDesc: Expenses that you are expected to pay in the set given time range.
